alert.note: Alert for Kaibab Plateau (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued December 31 at 4:22AM MST until January 02 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 11 PM THIS EVENING TO 5 AM MST MONDAY ABOVE 6000 FEET... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected above 6000 feet. Total snow accumulations of 6 to 12 inches with as much as 15 inches for the highest elevations. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph Saturday, decreasing to 25 mph Sunday. * WHERE...Areas above 6000 feet near Jacob Lake. * WHEN...From 11 PM this evening to 5 AM MST Monday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. These hazardous conditions could impact holiday travel Sunday. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Snow forecast from 11 PM Today to 5 AM Monday: Jacob Lake 6 to 10 inches.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
